 2014-03222014-03-27,  JUS,  ,  , 
ActJudges Act (Removal Allowance) Order
SubjectHon. David L. Edwards ** Removal Allowance **
PrecisOrder authorizing an additional period from November 9, 2013 to May 8, 2014 for the Hon. DAVID L. EDWARDS, a Judge of the Superior Court of Justice in and for the Province of Ontario, further to his relocation from the City of St.Catharines to the City of Brampton, Ontario for the reimbursement of the difference between the sale price of the former residence and its fair market value.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
